类型: Size: X-LargeColor: Black and White Stripe
评论详情: A surprisingly comfortable dress and actually fit and bonus points it has pockets 😁 I think I'd buy again

Could have gone down a size, bust area does have some “baggy” cloth in middle, but that’s because I’m plus sized, but my chest is not proportional to that of my body. Not all fat women have massive boobies to fill the tops all the way! :’( Overall great quality, had a few loose threads but not anything of structural integrity. Can be worn off the shoulders too so that a big win. Has a second little “slip” so you can’t see through the dress, so it’s thick enough. Has quite a bit of stretch to it, like I said, I do wish I would’ve ordered down a size. The black is pretty dark. It does come down past my knees so it’s a little more “modest” if you have to bend over.

Living in a beach town, I’m always on the lookout for pieces that make me feel effortlessly cool, and this Scarlet Darkness dress is it! It has that perfect touch of gothic elegance with just enough pirate-inspired flair to make me feel amazing every time I wear it.  As a plus-size girl, finding a dress with comfortable sleeves can be a struggle, but this one fits like a dream—no tight arms here! The flowy fabric and flattering fit make it perfect for casual outings or when I want to dress up and feel extra confident. I get compliments every time I wear it, and honestly, it’s become a staple in my wardrobe. Absolutely love it!
Amazing quality and great fit. 10 out of 10 guys. Gets it you won't regret it. Now I wanna grab the other colors too.

评论概述: Cute, comfy, and it has pockets
类型: Size: X-LargeColor: Black and White Stripe
评论详情: This runs slightly large, so if you’re between sizes don’t be afraid to size down. The dress is comfortable and it has an extra layer of lining to keep the skirt from being see through. Very cute to go out in, plus it has pockets! It’s not a thick fabric, but it feels to be alright quality.
I'm a plus size lady. This fit great and I paired it with a corset.  It's got side pockets too.
It was nice but it was too big for me. I am very petite

评论概述: Great for Halloween Now And In The Future (and just for funsies)
评论详情: I bought this dress because my kid wanted to match for Halloween. I thought it would be more practical to find a dress I can reuse and this fit the bill. I also used to be a Goth kid and that part of me will never die, so I'm happy to have it just because. I got loads of compliments as a witch.  I'm 5'4, 180 lbs with a 38DD chest and the large fit me beautifully. I'm trying to lose weight, and as I do, this dress will scale down (or up) with me because of the elastic waist. I didn't wear an underskirt but one would definitely fit and give it even more va va voom.  It's comfortable AND HAS POCKETS!  I want to buy more colors!

Bought for a Renaissance Faire! Exactly what I was looking for and fit me perfectly!
Buy it now! True to size and so comfortable

评论详情: I ordered a medium and I initially thought the material felt [and would therefore look] rather costume-y. The good news is it looks wonderful, and I got tons of compliments on it! The size fits perfectly, the length is great, and it has POCKETS!

Length of the dress was great and I loved the simplicity of the style. I recommend hanging it up to let the wrinkles subside and double check if you can use heat to remove wrinkles if you're in a rush. The fit was great and it's double layered.

类型: Size: SmallColor: Black and White Stripe
评论详情: Very nice dress with a Tim Burton-esque feel to it. Material seems durable and held well during first wash. Band across the middle gives it some stretch if needed.

Ruffles are very pretty.  Lace detail is also very pretty. It is very elastic so weight loss or gain is no problem. It has pockets. My new favorite dress.  I bought two. One in black and one black and white stripe. I added a bow to the front of each but they don't need anything, they are beautiful dresses.

This dress is mostly great.  The material is smooth and doesn't need an iron.  It's skirt is full and thick with a liner.  The ruffle at the bottom is cute.  The lace around the collar isn't itchy.  It even has pockets, though they are fairly small.  You could tuck away a tissue or some chapstick but nothing heavy or important.  It feels well-made and is comfortable.  My problem with the dress, however, is that I requested it before there were any pictures of women wearing it.  The dress by itself appears to have the elastic around the natural waist.  The only way that happens is if you push it off the shoulders and down to a nearly indecent level.  It is much less figure-flattering with the empire waist.

First off, I was worried the lace would be really thin and ruin really easy during wash but it is a much more durable, thicker, lace. Fits me perfect and can be worn with a corset. The fabric feels amazing, very light, not heavy at all. The fabric is nice quality but thin enough I don’t feel sweaty wearing this during warmer months. It also has a nice puff to it, not flat and lifeless at all. Looks exactly like the picture. Beautiful!

类型: Size: LargeColor: Black and White Stripe
评论详情: I bought this dress to wear as Cruella DeVille for Halloween, and I'm thrilled with how it looks with my red gloves and black & white wig. Would also be really cute as a pirate costume, or every day dress if you're into black & white stripes. It is comfortable with the sleeves on the should or off, and hits in the middle of my shins (I'm 5'0").
